name: Reconverse
description: Reconverse aims to provide a coherent and composable suite of analytics tools for informing the response to disease outbreaks, health emergencies and humanitarian crises, using the R software environment.

SDGs.evidenceText: Recoverse is a package of open-source software analytics to help field experts, epidemiologists, researchers, and others make informed responses to disease outbreaks, health emergencies and humanitarian crises
